text: The following is a list of retired soccer players who have made at least 300 domestic league appearances in Australian league soccer. This includes the appearances and goals of former players of the A-League and National Soccer League. ==List of players== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" !
